researchQuestions.title: Precise Pulsar Distances
researchQuestions.description: What are the precise distances to the 44 millisecond pulsars being observed in the MSPSRPI2 program?

researchQuestions.title: Gravitational Wave Detection
researchQuestions.description: How can accurate astrometric measurements of millisecond pulsars improve the sensitivity of pulsar timing arrays for gravitational wave detection?

researchQuestions.title: Testing Relativity
researchQuestions.description: How can precise distance measurements to millisecond pulsars in binary systems improve tests of general relativity and alternative theories of gravity?

researchQuestions.title: Galactic Distribution
researchQuestions.description: How do millisecond pulsars distribute throughout the Galaxy, and what does this reveal about their formation and evolution?
